Name.label: Classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency, simple virilizing form
Classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency

TextSection.Contents: The simple virilizing form of classical congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency (classical 21 OHD CAH; see this term) is characterized by genital ambiguity and virilization of the external genitalia in females, hypocortisolism and precocious pseudopuberty without salt-wasting.
